project_descr: Support By UNDP and UNFPA to National Population Commission in conducting the 2005 population Census

outputs.output_descr:
The project aims to support the 2005 census project which was facilitated by UNDP, UNFPA nad the National Population Commission. 

The Federal Government of Nigeria (FGN) implemented a nationwide Population and Housing Census in March 2006, with substantial financial and technical support principally from the European Commission (EC), the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP), the United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA), and the Department for International Development (DFID).  With the release of the census results, there is widespread agreement, that the 2006 Census was held in a fair,
donor_name: United Nations Office on Drug and Crime chgd from UN INTERNATIONAL DRUG CONTROL on april 2011
